# portalbasictheme.css - Auto-Generated Portal Theme Styles

## Overview
Microsoft-generated CSS file created through the Power Apps Portals Site Styling panel. This file defines the core theme styling including the 12-color palette system, typography using Montserrat font family, button styles, navigation components, and responsive layouts. **This file should not be manually edited** as changes will be overwritten when themes are applied through the Site Styling panel.

## Location
`/web-files/portalbasictheme.css`
- **Web File ID**: b28a3415-b16a-4251-b570-beda59c0f49c
- **Parent Page ID**: 60419c17-9d55-4eb3-b9d8-a0f182dc38e2
- **Display Order**: 10
- **MIME Type**: text/css

## Configuration
- **Publishing State**: Published (81c6631c-ca6b-4b35-8228-8e759104c26e)
- **Excluded from Search**: Yes
- **Hidden from Sitemap**: No
- **Tracking Enabled**: No
- **Generated by**: Power Apps Portals Site Styling panel

## Font Imports
```css
@import url("https://content.powerapps.com/resource/powerappsportal/fonts/montserrat/v25/400.css");
@import url("https://content.powerapps.com/resource/powerappsportal/fonts/montserrat/v25/400-italic.css");
@import url("https://content.powerapps.com/resource/powerappsportal/fonts/montserrat/v25/700.css");
@import url("https://content.powerapps.com/resource/powerappsportal/fonts/montserrat/v25/700-italic.css");
@import url("https://content.powerapps.com/resource/powerappsportal/fonts/montserrat/v25/600.css");
@import url("https://content.powerapps.com/resource/powerappsportal/fonts/montserrat/v25/600-italic.css");
```
**Font Family**: Montserrat v25
**Weights**: 400 (Regular), 600 (Semi-Bold), 700 (Bold)
**Variants**: Regular and Italic for each weight

## Color Palette System

### CSS Custom Properties (Variables)
```css
:root {
  --portalThemeColor1: #1C1C45;  /* Dark Navy Blue */
  --portalThemeColor2: #ED573C;  /* Sherweb Orange/Red (Primary) */
  --portalThemeColor3: #00b4ff;  /* Bright Blue */
  --portalThemeColor4: #ed573c;  /* Sherweb Orange/Red (duplicate) */
  --portalThemeColor5: #0061AA;  /* Medium Blue */
  --portalThemeColor6: #5C5A58;  /* Dark Gray */
  --portalThemeColor7: #FFFFFF;  /* White */
  --portalThemeColor8: #000000;  /* Black */
  --portalThemeColor9: #191817;  /* Near Black */
  --portalThemeColor10: #ffffff; /* White (lowercase) */
  --portalThemeColor11: #e3e3e3; /* Light Gray */
  --portalThemeColor12: #f8f8f8; /* Very Light Gray */
}
```

### "On Color" Variables (Text colors for backgrounds)
```css
:root {
  --portalThemeOnColor1: #FFFFFF;  /* White on Dark Navy */
  --portalThemeOnColor2: #000000;  /* Black on Orange */
  --portalThemeOnColor3: #000000;  /* Black on Bright Blue */
  --portalThemeOnColor4: #000000;  /* Black on Orange */
  --portalThemeOnColor5: #FFFFFF;  /* White on Medium Blue */
  --portalThemeOnColor6: #FFFFFF;  /* White on Dark Gray */
  --portalThemeOnColor7: #000000;  /* Black on White */
  --portalThemeOnColor8: #FFFFFF;  /* White on Black */
  --portalThemeOnColor9: #FFFFFF;  /* White on Near Black */
  --portalThemeOnColor10: #000000; /* Black on White */
  --portalThemeOnColor11: #000000; /* Black on Light Gray */
  --portalThemeOnColor12: #000000; /* Black on Very Light Gray */
}
```

### Color Usage Guide

| Color Variable | Hex Code | Color Name | Primary Use |
|----------------|----------|------------|-------------|
| Color1 | #1C1C45 | Dark Navy Blue | Headers, accents |
| Color2 | #ED573C | Sherweb Orange | Primary brand color, CTAs |
| Color3 | #00b4ff | Bright Blue | Links, hover states |
| Color4 | #ed573c | Sherweb Orange | Duplicate of Color2 |
| Color5 | #0061AA | Medium Blue | Secondary accents |
| Color6 | #5C5A58 | Dark Gray | Text, borders |
| Color7 | #FFFFFF | White | Backgrounds, light elements |
| Color8 | #000000 | Black | Text, high contrast |
| Color9 | #191817 | Near Black | Footers, dark sections |
| Color10 | #ffffff | White | Backgrounds (duplicate) |
| Color11 | #e3e3e3 | Light Gray | Borders, dividers |
| Color12 | #f8f8f8 | Very Light Gray | Background sections |

## Component Theme Classes

### Theme Application Pattern
Each color has a corresponding data attribute selector:
```css
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] {
  background-color: var(--portalThemeColor1);
  color: var(--portalThemeOnColor1);
}
```

### Automatic Typography Inheritance
All theme colors automatically style typography elements:
```css
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] h1,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] h2,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] h3,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] h4,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] h5,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] h6,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] p,
[data-component-theme="portalThemeColor1"] p.smallText {
  color: var(--portalThemeOnColor1);
}
```

## Typography Styles

### Heading Styles
- **H1**: 40px, Montserrat 400, Black (#000000)
- **H2**: 36px, Montserrat 400, Black (#000000)
- **H3**: 24px, Montserrat 400, Black (#000000)
- **H4**: 24px, Montserrat 700, Black (#000000)
- **H5**: 14px, Montserrat 700, Black (#000000)

### Body Text
- **Paragraph**: 20px, Montserrat 400, Black (#000000)
- **Small Text (.p2)**: 16px, Arial 400, Black (#000000)
- **Links**: 14px, Montserrat 400, Orange (#ed573c)

### Footer Text
- **Font**: Montserrat 400, 16px
- **Color**: White (#FFFFFF)
- **Footer Bottom BG**: Near Black (#191817)

## Button Styles

### Primary Button (.btn-primary, .button1)
```css
.btn-primary {
  color: #FFFFFF;
  background-color: #ed573c;  /* Sherweb Orange */
  border-color: #ed573c;
  border-radius: 2px;
  font-family: Montserrat;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 6px 20px;
}
```
**Hover/Active/Focus**: Background changes to #191817 (Near Black), maintains white text

### Secondary Button (.btn-secondary, .btn-default, .button2)
```css
.button2 {
  color: #ed573c;  /* Orange text */
  background-color: transparent;
  border-color: #ed573c;
  border-radius: 2px;
  font-family: Montserrat;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 6px 20px;
  border-width: 1.6px;
}
```
**Hover/Active/Focus**: Background #ed573c (Orange), text white

### Disabled States
- **Disabled Links**: Color #A19F9D (Gray), pointer-events: none
- **Disabled Buttons**: Background #F3F2F1, Color #A19F9D

## Navigation Styles

### Navbar Configuration
```css
.static-top.navbar-dark {
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 1.55rem 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e7e7;
  z-index: 9999;
}
```

### Nav Link Styles
- **Font**: Montserrat 400, 20px
- **Hover**: Color #00b2ff (Bright Blue), transparent background
- **Focus**: Color #00b2ff, underlined
- **Focus-Visible**: Background #ed573c (Orange), Color #000000 (Black)

### Dropdown Menu Styles
```css
.navbar-dark .navbar-nav .show.dropdown-menu {
  background-color: #0a98f3;  /* Bright Blue */
  color: #fff;
}
```
**Dropdown Items Hover**: Background white, text #0a98f3 (Blue)

### Mobile Nav Toggler
```css
.navbar-toggler {
  background-color: #ed573c;
}
```
**Hover**: Background #191817, border #191817
**Focus**: Border white, background #191817

## Form Elements

### Form Controls
- **Background**: White (#FFFFFF) !important
- **Text Color**: Black (#000000)
- **Focus State**: Black text maintained

### Select Dropdown Custom Arrow
```css
.form-select, .crmentityformview select {
  background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8, %3Csvg viewBox='0 0 16 16' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath stroke='%23000000' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' fill='none' d='m2 5 6 6 6-6'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: right .75rem center;
  background-size: 16px 12px;
}
```

## Layout Classes

### Column Block Layout
```css
.columnBlockLayout {
  margin-top: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  padding: 16px;
}
```

### Flex Container
```css
.ppFlexContainer {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 8px;
}
```

## Responsive Breakpoints

### Container Max Widths
```css
/* Small devices (≥576px) */
@media (min-width: 576px) {
  .row.sectionBlockLayout > .container { max-width: 540px; }
}

/* Medium devices (≥768px) */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .row.sectionBlockLayout > .container { max-width: 720px; }
}

/* Large devices (≥992px) */
@media (min-width: 992px) {
  .row.sectionBlockLayout > .container { max-width: 960px; }
}

/* Extra large devices (≥1200px) */
@media (min-width: 1200px) {
  .row.sectionBlockLayout > .container { max-width: 1140px; }
}

/* XXL devices (≥1400px) */
@media (min-width: 1400px) {
  .row.sectionBlockLayout > .container { max-width: 1320px; }
}
```

## Table Styles

### Table Hover & Info States
- **Hover Background**: #f2f2f2 (Light Gray)
- **Info Cells Background**: #f2f2f2 (Light Gray)
- **Striped Rows**: Background unset (disabled)

## Entity Forms & Lists
```css
.crmEntityFormView, .entitylist, .modal-content, .popover-content {
  background-color: #FFFFFF;
  color: #000000;
  border: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
}
```

## Breadcrumb Styling
```css
.breadcrumb {
  background-color: transparent;
}
.breadcrumb > li a {
  color: #ed573c;  /* Orange links */
}
.breadcrumb > .active {
  color: #000000;  /* Black for active */
}
```

## Special Utility Classes

### Site Title (.siteTitle)
```css
h1.siteTitle {
  font-family: Montserrat;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-size: 30px;
  color: #000;
}
```

### Anchor Inheritance (.anchor-inherit-styles)
- Inherits font-size, font-family, and color from parent

### Anchor Hover Color Classes
- `.anchor-hover-color-color1` through `.anchor-hover-color-color12`
- Applies respective theme color on hover

## Custom Media Query Styles

### Desktop (≥1199px)
```css
@media (min-width: 1199px) {
  #navbar .dropdown-search {
    margin: 0px 0px 0px -70px !important;
  }
  .icon-article {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}
```

### Mobile (<1199px)
```css
@media (max-width: 1199px) {
  #navbar .dropdown-search {
    margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px !important;
  }
  #navbar .dropdown-search #q {
    width: 100% !important;
  }
}
```

## Article Styling
```css
.article-container p, .article-container span, .article-container li {
  font-size: 16px !important;
}
.article-container tr:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #fafafa;
}
```

## Usage
This file is automatically loaded as part of the portal's theme system. It provides:
1. **Base styling** for all portal components
2. **Theme color system** via CSS variables and data attributes
3. **Typography standards** using Montserrat font family
4. **Component styling** for buttons, forms, navigation, tables
5. **Responsive layouts** with Bootstrap-compatible breakpoints

## Important Notes
- **DO NOT MANUALLY EDIT** this file
- Changes will be **overwritten** when applying themes via Site Styling panel
- Use `custom.css` or `theme.css` for additional customizations
- File generated by Microsoft Power Apps Portals

## Related Components
- **theme.css**: Additional theme customizations (builds on this file)
- **custom.css**: Custom CSS overrides
- **bootstrap.min.css**: Base Bootstrap framework
- **Site Styling Panel**: Power Apps portal admin interface for theme management

## Change History
- Auto-generated by Power Apps Portals Site Styling panel
- Implements Sherweb brand colors (#ED573C primary)
- Uses Montserrat font family across all typography
- 12-color palette system with "on color" text definitions
- Responsive design with 5 breakpoints (576px, 768px, 992px, 1200px, 1400px)
